document.heading: SUPERIOR COURT OF THE DISTRICT OF COLUMBIA MASTER JURY LIST PROJECT CLARIFICATION ACT OF 2003

history.narrative: Law 15-50, the “Superior Court of the District of Columbia Master Jury List Project Clarification Act of 2003”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 15-66, which was referred to the Committee on Finance and Revenue. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on July 8, 2003, and September 16, 2003, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on October 6, 2003, it was assigned Act No. 15-163 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 15-50 became effective on December 9, 2003.
